alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Jasper; Jefferson; Newton; Orange; Tyler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Child Abduction Emergency issued December 10 at 3:34AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The following message is transmitted at the request of the Texas Department of Public Safety. THIS IS A STATEWIDE CHILD ABDUCTION ALERT ISSUED BY THE TEXAS AMBER ALERT NETWORK THE SAN ANTONIO POLICE DEPARTMENT IS SEARCHING FOR MILO ORTIZ, WHITE, MALE, 4 YEARS OLD, 3 FEET 6 INCHESB TALL, 41 POUNDS, BROWN HAIR, BROWN EYES, LAST SEEN WEARING A BLUE LONG SLEEVE SHIRT, GRAY SWEATPANTS, AND TENNIS SHOES. THE SAN ANTONIO POLICE DEPARTMENT IS ALSO SEARCHING FOR SIENNA ORTIZ, WHITE, FEMALE, 2 YEARS OLD, 2 FEET 6 INCHES, 29 POUNDS, BROWN HAIR, BROWN EYES, LAST SEEN WEARING AN AQUA BLUE BLOUSE WITH PINK FIGURINES AND WHITE CONVERSE SHOES POLICE ARE LOOKING FOR DEMETRI ORTIZ, 22 YEARS OLD, WHITE, MALE, HEIGHT 5 FEET, 7 INCHES TALL, WEIGHT 130 POUNDS, BLACK HAIR, BROWN EYES AND LAST SEEN WEARING A WHITE SHIRT AND BLACK SHORTS, IN CONNECTION WITH THEIR ABDUCTION. SUSPECT HAS A TATTOO ON HIS CHEST. THE SUSPECT IS DRIVING A BLACK, 2015, CHRYSLER 300 BEARING TEXAS LICENSE PLATE NUMBER L P R 4 5 4 3. THE SUSPECT WAS LAST SEEN IN SAN ANTONIO, TEXAS. LAW ENFORCEMENT OFFICIALS BELIEVE THE CHILDREN TO BE IN GRAVE OR IMMEDIATE DANGER. IF YOU HAVE ANY INFORMATION REGARDING THIS ABDUCTION, CALL THE SAN ANTONIO POLICE DEPARTMENT AT 2 1 0 2 0 7 7 6 6 0. NEWS MEDIA POINT OF CONTACT IS SAN ANTONIO POLICE DEPARTMENT AT 2 1 0 2 0 7 7 6 6 0.
